com.agoda.downloader.service

Class DownloadService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agoda.downloader.service.DownloadService

  • public class DownloadService
extends java.lang.Object
    Is service component of application which manage all {@link DownloadActivity}. It schedules all download request concurrently using thread pool

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DownloadService(java.lang.String sources, java.lang.String downloadLocation) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cleanActivities()
      Clean up all activities that are pending, incomplete or never initiated.
      void downloadAll()
      Starts downloading all requested resources by submitting {@link DownloadActivity} for each resources to thread scheduler
      java.util.List<DownloadActivity> getDownloadActivities()
      Get all {@link DownloadActivity}
      DownloadActivity getUpdatedActivity()
      Retrieves the recently finished or updated {@link DownloadActivity}.
      void waitForCompletion()
      Allows service consumer to wait until all download task get finish It also logs the status of each activity as well

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DownloadService

        public DownloadService(java.lang.String sources,
                       java.lang.String downloadLocation)

    • Method Detail

      • downloadAll

        public void downloadAll()
        Starts downloading all requested resources by submitting {@link DownloadActivity} for each resources to thread scheduler

      • getUpdatedActivity

        public DownloadActivity getUpdatedActivity()
                                    throws DownloadException
        Retrieves the recently finished or updated {@link DownloadActivity}. Caller get blocked until activity get available It allows service consumer to retrieve one by one activity as they its download process get finished without waiting for all download request to complete
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DownloadException

      • getDownloadActivities

        public java.util.List<DownloadActivity> getDownloadActivities()
        Get all {@link DownloadActivity}
        Returns:

      • waitForCompletion

        public void waitForCompletion()
        Allows service consumer to wait until all download task get finish It also logs the status of each activity as well

      • cleanActivities

        public void cleanActivities()
        Clean up all activities that are pending, incomplete or never initiated. this method is useful while executing cleanup service during application shutdown
